emailData.subject: Gefilte Fish
emailData.text: Where are we on this? Looking to purchase some for a family event. Can you order some on Amazon?

emailData.subject: Jacob K. Javits Center
emailData.text: I'm thinking that the Javits Convention Center in NYC is perfect for our election night rally and celebration. Its location in New York is a testament to your service to this state, and the glass ceiling is evocative of some clear symbolism in your campaign. What do you think of this location?

emailData.subject: Larry Pressler
emailData.text:
John -
I wanted to let you know what Senator Pressler and I finally connected.

He is going to draft an op-ed endorsing Hillary and send me a draft version in the next two weeks. He will focus his endorsement on her long time work helping our veterans, as well as her foreign policy background. Ben on the surrogates team will help him refine his op-ed, and we will place it on his behalf.

Very good discussion. Also says post endorsement, he's happy to help with any "Republicans for Hillary" organizing activities, and also happy to help us in the Mormon community.

He's also requesting your personal phone number for future communication about Republican backing of our campaign--mind sending that over?

Thanks!
Adrienne

emailData.subject: Someone has your password
emailData.text:
Hi John,

Someone just used your password to try to sign in to your Google Account john.podesta@gmail.com.

Details:
 Saturday, 19 March, 8:34:30 UTC
 IP Address: 134.249.139.239
 Location: Ukraine

Google stopped this sign-in attempt. You should change your password immediately.

Best, The Gmail Team
